snippet: Christian Harrison, 18, has gained more than 1,000 spots in the rankings in a year, but has some work to do to match his brother, 20-year-old Ryan Harrison.
abstract: Christian Harrison, 18, has gained more than 1,000 spots in the rankings in a year, but has some work to do to match his brother, 20-year-old Ryan Harrison.

headline.main: Climbing the Rankings, and Hoping to Follow in His Brother's Footsteps
